text.tspan: The resolve button shows for 'Open' status.
It changes to a split 'Reopen' and 'Close' button when the issue is 'resolved'
I the 'Closed' state, the button is a 'Reopen' button
If 'duplicate' is selected, a dropdown appears
Save and return to issue search
Save and add another. The form will
default to the current issue type and
